section.title: Dell 62xx
section.para: The following steps show how a Dell 62xx is configured for zone-level layer-3 switching. These steps assume VLAN 201 is used to route untagged private IPs for pod 1, and pod 1â€™s layer-2 switch is connected to Ethernet port 1/g1.
The Dell 62xx Series switch supports up to 1024 VLANs.

listitem.para: Configure all the VLANs in the database.

listitem.programlisting: interface ethernet 1/g1 switchport mode general switchport general pvid 201 switchport general allowed vlan add 201 untagged switchport general allowed vlan add 300-999 tagged exit

section.para: The statements configure Ethernet port 1/g1 as follows:

listitem.para: VLAN 201 is the native untagged VLAN for port 1/g1.
All VLANs (300-999) are passed to all the pod-level layer-2 switches.
